resources.string: Experience the Future of Voice Cloning
Elevate your audio with our AI voice clning, transforming text into stunningly realistic speech.
Perfect for engaging voiceovers, experience unparalleled clarity and verstaility in every narrative
Create natural-sounding speech easily with our advanced text-to-speech technology. Our AI brings emotions to life, making every voice unique and expressive

Create personalized voice clones using Kotodama’s advanced voice cloning technology. Our AI Captures unique vocal characteristics, ensuring each clone is as expressive and authentic as the original voice.
When will multilingual service be supported?
Our AI Already supports multiple languages. You can simply type the text and our AI automatically understands and generates the speech for you
How do I cancel my subscription
You can cancel your subscription anytime without being subjected to any inquiries. Google Play Store manages all the subscriptions.
How do I request a refund?
Since all transactions for our app are processed through the Google Play Store, we cannot issue refunds directly. However, you can request a refund directly from Google.
Type here for your AI Speech!
Please be advised that the characters you are presently acquiring are exclusively accessible while your subscription remains active!
You have reached the maximum number of voice clones allowed. To create a new voice clone, please purchase an additional slot to create more voice clones.

1. Share your code with your friends

Your Unique AI Voice is Ready!
Use your custom voice and say anything!
Please provide between 30 seconds to 7 minutes of your voice.

Kotodama AI is your gateway to the future of text-to-speech technology. With Kotodama AI, you can easily clone your voice and use it for TTS, bringing a personal touch to your digital communications. Whether you’re narrating a story, creating content, or just having fun with text-to-speech, Kotodama AI ensures that your voice sounds natural, clear, and uniquely yours. The app captures every detail, making your digital voice indistinguishable from your real one. Imagine the convenience of turning written words into spoken ones, all with your own voice.

Morning, I wake up early and walk my dog around the neighborhood. The streets are quiet and peaceful, with birds chirping and a cool breeze blowing. We often meet other friendly people and their pets, and I enjoy watching the sun rise, painting the sky with beautiful colors as the day begins.

As the sun begins to set, I like to unwind with a calming evening ritual. I light a few scented candles and dim the lights in my living room. The soft glow creates a warm and cozy atmosphere, perfect for relaxing after a long day. I often make myself a cup of herbal tea and settle into my favorite chair with a good book. The quietness of the evening, paired with the gentle flicker of the candles, helps me reflect on the day and prepare for a restful night ahead.
